name: Malefactor
description:
**NOTE: This is an early access battle gameplay demo. The final version will feature an entire dungeon, character progression and customization, and a storyline.**

Malefactor is a JRPG-style battle game with roguelike customization elements. Each time you start a new battle, you will have a new random list of powers, and fight against random enemies. 

Gain a new list of powerful abilities every time you play! Fight a variety of enemy encounters, with a new one each time you win or lose!

Controls: ESC brings up the menu, from which you can load a new battle or quit.
All other actions are handled via the mouse.
